name: Katana
Lore: 'Introduced during the Clone Wars. 600 meters long. Some have cargo space converted to TIE hanger bays. Still used to maintain an Imperial presence in the Outer Rim.',
Text: 'May add 3 pilots, 6 passengers and 4 TIEs. Your other Dreadnaughts here are power +1, forfeit +2, Heroic, and Immune to attrition < 4. Permanent pilot provides ability of 3. Immune to attrition < 4.(Original concept by Thomas Caspersen - Sandvika V-Lite 2005)',
